name: The Witcher: Project Sirius
summary: Game developed by The Molasses Flood with support from the CD PROJEKT RED team, set in The Witcher universe. It has been described to tell "an unforgettable story for existing Witcher fans and new audiences." Compared to existing CD PROJEKT RED games, this one is said to "target a much broader audience." Sirius will include both single-player and multiplayer gameplay.
